title.rendered: Willfredo Gerardo and Chance Watt at LAFW 2021

content.rendered:
24Fashion TV Exclusive: Designer Willfredo Gerardo and artist Chance Watt collaborated together and presented a hand-painted color collection featuring hand-painted neon and pastel designs in elevated street style looks: red and yellow long painted dresses, gold painted body suits, knee length-colored boots, pink, green and yellow dresses, pink leggings, patted shoulders jacket. 

About: Willfredo Gerardo is a favorite among celebrities including Marjorie De Sousa, Daphne Joy, and Chiquis Rivera. The designs are frequently seen on major red-carpets and have been featured in Elle Bulgaria, Runway Magazine featuring Nancy ODell, and People en Espano. Willfredo Gerardo now resides in Miami, FL and is currently expanding his couture line.

Watch the full show for FREE on 24FashionTV channel on ROKU TV or Amazon Fire TV

Photo by Jeff McDonald exclusively for 24Fashion TV

LAFW powered by Art Hearts Fashion
